name: The Engine of Time
description:
The Engine of Time is a 2D maze puzzle game.  Night and day take place because of a time machine, that can't work without the small gears that compose it.

The player has the mission to guide the gears across the maze in order to make the days to happen correctly in time.

Controls:
Move - Arrow Keys

Review maze - SPACE Bar

Pause and exit - ESC

Credits:

Nacho Pérez - Game Designer and Programmer

María Gil - Art 2D

Jorge Ramírez - FX Sound and Music

Raquel Souto - Producer

Follow us on Twitter: @CoraheGame
